author: Staff Reporter
text:
A three-member peer team of the National Assessment and Accreditation Council (NAAC) will visit D.K.M. College for Women from January 28 to 30 for assessing the institution for re-accreditation.

P.S. Bisen, former Vice Chancellor of Jiwaji University, Gwalior, is the chairperson of the team, according to a press release.
title: NAAC team to visit college
